idea-plugin.name: Base16 Isotope

Base 16 Isotope for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Jan T. Sott. Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
